detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#50-53) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#51)

StandardToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#123-209) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#5)
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#106-108)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#6)
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#90-99)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#7)
	- BasicToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BorToken.sol#81-83)
